translations: v．咳痰，吐痰：从喉咙或肺部排出痰液。
· He was expectorating into a tissue.

sentences.sentence: Asverin is provided with an expectorating action which has been never found in any conventional antitussitive agents so far available in the market.
sentences.translation: 安嗽灵的祛痰作用是迄今市场上可买到的常用镇咳药中前所未有的。

sentences.sentence: The improvements on physical signs of lung, symptoms as cough, dyspnea and sputum expectorating in the treated group were significantly better than those in the control group (P<0.05).
sentences.translation: 治疗组患儿肺部体征、咳嗽、喘促和痰症状的改善情况明显优于对照组（P<0.05）。
